name: Speed Masters ASD
description:
(Please keep in mind this is the work of a single person from start to finish)
Compete in thrilling races, build your own tracks easily and share them with your friends to see who is the best

Features:
-15 cool cars inspired by the best designs in cars you know
-26 tracks to compete against the CPU and unlock all the cars and tracks
-10 original music tracks to make you feel the speed
-Track editor to build easily your crazy track idea allowing different heights
-Many game modes, compete against time, cpu or your friends best race
